NEW YORK, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About document camerasDocument cameras, also known as visualizers or digital visual presenters, refer to devices used to project images of three-dimensional objects placed under the camera. It makes teaching/lectures more interactive and comprehensive. Although it can be used in any type of classroom, it is mostly used in technical institutions that involve the study of complex concepts. However, given its ability to enhance learning visually, these cameras are gaining popularity in the primary school setting as well. As a result, this device has immense scope in the education sector as it not only provides images, but also aids in recording and effective delivery of lectures.Technavio's analysts forecast the global document camera for smart classroom market to grow at a CAGR of 10.52% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this Report This report covers the current scenario and the growth prospects of the global document camera for smart classroom market for the period 2015-2019. To calculate overall market size, the report considers revenue generated through the sales of portable and ceiling document cameras in schools and higher educational institutions.Technavio's report, Global Document Camera for Smart Classroom Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers North America, Europe, APAC, Latin America, and MEA; it also covers the landscape of the global document camera for smart classroom market and its growth prospects in the coming years.
